issue.title: Migrate -doc jobs to a new s3 location?

content.raw:
The [gazebo-default-doc job is currently failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-doc/126) due to an invalid key; it would probably be a good time to update the upload location:

~~~
+ ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/gazebo-default-doc/workspace/id_rsa ubuntu@old.gazebosim.org sudo rm -rf /var/www/api/dev /tmp/gazebo_dev /tmp/dev.html
Warning: Permanently added 'old.gazebosim.org,54.83.92.199' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.
Permission denied (publickey).
~~~
content.html:
The gazebo-default-doc job is currently failing due to an invalid key; it would probably be a good time to update the upload location:

+ ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -i /var/lib/jenkins/jobs/gazebo-default-doc/workspace/id_rsa ubuntu@old.gazebosim.org sudo rm -rf /var/www/api/dev /tmp/gazebo_dev /tmp/dev.html
Warning: Permanently added 'old.gazebosim.org,54.83.92.199' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.
Permission denied (publickey).
